my cm is alsow crashing just before seson starts but my puter says that is becourse the triel is up so i dont know if the crak isent working
Crashes like the rest of the versions.

During installation process it's asked if you want to "send anonymous information" to improve the game.
Of course you don't want that, because it can make your game "crash". You must uncheck this box. 
IMO

CORRECTION:
In Game Options, Preferences, disable Allow Anonymous Data Collection.
And use CMLauncher.exe to run the game.
